library_weekend: The library is open on weekends from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM
exam_period: The exam period for this semester is from January 15th to January 30th
registration_deadline: Registration for the next semester ends on February 10th
tuition_fees: Annual tuition fees are 45,000 DZD for national students and 90,000 DZD for international students
scholarship_info: Scholarship applications are open from September 1st to September 30th. Contact the financial aid office for more details
academic_calendar: The academic year is divided into two semesters: Fall (September-January) and Spring (February-June)
it_department: The IT department is located in Block B, 2nd floor. Contact: it-support@estin.dz
student_clubs: ESTIN has various clubs: Programming Club, Robotics Club, Debate Club, and Sports Club
wifi_access: WiFi access: Connect to 'ESTIN-WiFi' using your student credentials. For issues, contact IT support
transcript_request: To request a transcript, visit the administration office with your student ID. Processing time is 3-5 days
id_card_loss: If you lose your student ID, report immediately to the administration office. Replacement fee: 500 DZD
parking_info: Student parking is available in the west parking lot. Parking permit required - get it from security office
cafeteria_hours: Cafeteria hours: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM. Breakfast: 7-10 AM, Lunch: 11 AM-2 PM, Snacks: 2-7 PM
sports_facilities: Sports facilities include a gym, basketball court, and football field. Open from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM
professor_office: Professor office hours are posted on their office doors and the department bulletin boards
book_rental: Textbook rental is available at the library. Maximum 3 books for 2 weeks
graduation_requirements: Graduation requires completing all courses, minimum GPA of 2.0, and no outstanding fees
internship_opportunities: Internship opportunities are posted on the career portal. Contact the career office for guidance
coding_club: The Coding Club meets every Wednesday at 4:00 PM in Room B203
contact_email: For general inquiries: info@estin.dz, Administration: admin@estin.dz, IT: support@estin.dz
holiday_schedule: Next holidays: Winter break from December 20th to January 5th
lab_access: Computer labs are accessible from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM. Student ID required for entry
